feature: Replace default README with project-specific documentation
description: The README.md is still the default Next.js template. It contains no information about SUI-GENERIS or the Fokus-Check application, missing critical project overview, business context, and project-specific setup instructions.

phases.name: Analysis & Planning
phases.description: Analyze existing codebase structure and identify all elements to document

subtasks.title: Review existing README and project structure
subtasks.description: Analyze current README.md (default Next.js template) and understand what needs to be replaced. Review package.json, src/ structure, and key files.
subtasks.notes: Completed during initial analysis. Project is SUI GENERIS Fokus-Check/Fokus-Audit website built with Next.js 16, React 19, Supabase, TailwindCSS.

subtasks.title: Write project overview and business context
subtasks.description: Create header with project name, add business context about SUI GENERIS, Fokus-Check (free 3-min quiz), and Fokus-Audit (premium coaching). Include target audience info (entrepreneurs, DACH region).
subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive README header with project name (SUI GENERIS), business context, Fokus-Check description (free 3-min quiz), Fokus-Audit description (premium 3h workshop), additional offerings (FOKUS: Human-First, FOKUS: System), and target audience info (DACH entrepreneurs/leaders). Commit: 2fad20a

subtasks.title: Document tech stack and prerequisites
subtasks.description: Add comprehensive tech stack section covering Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, TailwindCSS 4, Supabase, @react-pdf/renderer. List required prerequisites (Node.js, Bun/npm).
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive Tech Stack section with tables covering Next.js 16.0.10, React 19.2.1, TypeScript 5.x, TailwindCSS 4.x, Supabase 2.89.0, @react-pdf/renderer 4.3.1, and ESLint 9.x. Added Prerequisites section with Node.js requirements (18.17+), package manager options (Bun/npm/pnpm/yarn), and optional development tools (Git, VS Code extensions). Commit: 1c9938b

subtasks.title: Add getting started and development instructions
subtasks.description: Write installation steps, development server commands, build commands, and linting. Include environment setup guidance.
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive Getting Started section with installation steps (clone, install, configure env vars) and Development section with commands table (dev/build/start/lint), development server options (port, turbopack), production build instructions, linting with ESLint, and TypeScript type-checking. Environment variables documented: NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL, NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY. Commit: 2623c40

subtasks.title: Document project structure and routes
subtasks.description: Add project structure overview showing src/app routes (fokus-check, fokus-audit, fokus-human, fokus-system, kontakt, ueber, datenschutz, impressum), components organization (layout, sections, fokus-check, seo, ui), and lib/types directories.
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive project structure section to README with: full directory tree showing src/app routes (fokus-check, fokus-audit, fokus-human, fokus-system, kontakt, ueber, datenschutz, impressum), API routes, components organization (layout, sections, fokus-check with 15+ components, booking, seo, ui), lib directories (supabase, tracking), and types directory. Also added summary tables for key directories and routing overview. Commit: bad0cbf

subtasks.title: Add environment and deployment configuration
subtasks.description: Document required environment variables (Supabase connection), deployment notes for Vercel/Next.js. Include any known configuration requirements.
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive environment variables documentation (NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL, NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY, NEXT_PUBLIC_N8N_WEBHOOK_URL, NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL) with table overview and .env.local example. Added Vercel deployment guide with step-by-step instructions, deployment features table, alternative platforms (self-hosted, Docker, Netlify, AWS Amplify), configuration files reference, and security headers documentation. Commit: 9f286ea

subtasks.title: Review and verify README completeness
subtasks.description: Ensure all sections are complete, markdown formatting is correct, and documentation provides value for new developers. Verify no sensitive information is exposed.
subtasks.notes: README verification complete. All sections complete, markdown formatting correct, documentation provides value for new developers, no sensitive information exposed. All final acceptance criteria met.

final_acceptance: Business context (SUI GENERIS, Fokus-Check, Fokus-Audit) is clearly explained
notes: This is a documentation-only task. The current README.md is the default Next.js template with no project-specific information. The new README should comprehensively document the SUI GENERIS Fokus-Check/Fokus-Audit website including business context, tech stack, setup instructions, and project structure.
